title: Part 1: Maitland Ward (ACS September 6)
itunes:title: Part 1: Maitland Ward (ACS September 6)
description:
The gang revisits Adam’s twitter war with the teachers union and they take a look at the California bill which would punish doctors who spread misinformation. Former sitcom actor and current adult film star, Maitland Ward, comes into the studio to talk about her new book, ‘Rated X: How Porn Liberated Me from Hollywood’. She explains how the transition didn’t happen overnight and educates Adam on the process of getting your vagina casted to make sex toys. She talks about acting on ‘Boy Meets World’ and people constantly quoting her role in ‘White Chicks’. 

THANKS FOR SUPPORTING TODAY’S SPONSORS:

SimpliSafe.com/ADAM

Con-Cret.com/PODCAST

Geico.com

The Jordan Harbinger Show

TommyJohn.com/ADAM
